name: DrawingPad
0:
”Alexa, open Drawing Pad”
”Alexa, ask Drawing Pad for today's idea”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drawing pad
des:
Drawing Pad is the first of its kind for Alexa that lets you draw anything your imagination can dream up!

Use it to:
• Create colorful doodles
• Get a new, silly idea to draw every day
• Play drawing games like tic-tac-toe or Pictionary with your friends and family
• And more!

Drawing Pad is only supported on the Echo Show 10, Echo Show 8 and Echo Show 5.

HOW TO PLAY
• Use your finger to doodle on the screen
• Tap the menu to select tools like the paint brush, eraser, and undo button
• Tap the color picker to change colors and opacity
• Tap the lightbulb button or say "Alexa, give me an idea" for today's idea

FEATURES
• Draw smoothly with the paintbrush tool
• Select from one of 25 different brush sizes
• Use the eraser to modify a drawing
• Undo and redo your changes
• Select any color with the color picker and adjust its opacity
• Use the eyedropper to pick up a color from your drawing
• Save your drawings to your mobile device or laptop with the download tool
